Figures

Class Circle

  • java.lang.Object
    • Figures.GeometricFigure
      • Figures.Circle

  • public class Circle
extends GeometricFigure
    Class that creates and manipulates circles. Provides methods for translation, scaling, and collision creation.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Circle(java.lang.String s)
      Constructor for a circle

      double radius()

      Creates a new instance of the circle rotated by an angle (In the end, it does nothing)

      Scales the circle by the given factor.
      java.lang.String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the geometric figure.
      Circle translate(double dx, double dy)
      Creates a new instance of the circle moved by dx units on the x-axis and dy units on the y-axis
